languages.text: "Ну и, знаете..." {n}Идира смущенно отводит взгляд.{/n} "Если мне не так много осталось, я хоть проведу время с той, что мне действительно дорога... я ее чуть не потеряла по глупости, но теперь ума-то набралась немного. Так что... буду ценить каждую минуту, что рядом провожу".

"And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."
languages.original_text: "Ну и, знаете..." {n}Идира смущенно отводит взгляд.{/n} "Если мне не так много осталось, я хоть проведу время с той, что мне действительно дорога... я ее чуть не потеряла по глупости, но теперь ума-то набралась немного. Так что... буду ценить каждую минуту, что рядом провожу".

traits.locale_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment} "If I do not have much time left, I will at least spend it with the one I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I am a bit smarter now. So... I am going to treasure every minute she and I spend close."

"And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment} "If I do not have much time left, I will at least spend it with the one I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I am a bit smarter now. So... I am going to treasure every minute she and I spend close."

"And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

"And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

"And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

languages.text: “还有，你看……”{n}伊迪拉尴尬地移开了目光。{/n}“既然我已经不剩多少时间了，那我至少得和我真正在乎的人一起度过……我太蠢了，差点就失去了她，可现在我稍微聪明了点，所以……我打算珍惜与她在一起的每分每秒。”
languages.original_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

traits.locale_text: “还有，你看……”{n}伊迪拉尴尬地移开了目光。{/n}“既然我已经不剩多少时间了，那我至少得和我真正在乎的人一起度过……我太蠢了，差点就失去了她，可现在我稍微聪明了点，所以……我打算珍惜与她在一起的每分每秒。”

languages.text: «Y, ¿sabes?...». {n}Idira aparta la mirada, avergonzada.{/n} «Si no me queda mucho tiempo, por lo menos lo pasaré junto a la persona que más me importa... Casi la pierdo por mi estupidez, pero he aprendido de mis errores. Así que... ahora voy a atesorar cada momento a su lado».
languages.original_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

traits.locale_text: «Y, ¿sabes?...». {n}Idira aparta la mirada, avergonzada.{/n} «Si no me queda mucho tiempo, por lo menos lo pasaré junto a la persona que más me importa... Casi la pierdo por mi estupidez, pero he aprendido de mis errores. Así que... ahora voy a atesorar cada momento a su lado».

languages.text: 「それに、あの…」{n}イディラは恥ずかしそうに目をそらす。{/n}「残された時間が少ないなら、せめて本当に大切な人と過ごしたいわ…バカなことが原因で彼女を失いかけたけど、今のあたいなら少しは賢くなっているはず。だから…彼女と過ごせる時間を、一秒でも大切にしたいの」
languages.original_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、あの…」{n}イディラは恥ずかしそうに目をそらす。{/n}「残された時間が少ないなら、せめて本当に大切な人と過ごしたいわ…バカなことが原因で彼女を失いかけたけど、今のあたいなら少しは賢くなっているはず。だから…彼女と過ごせる時間を、一秒でも大切にしたいの」

languages.text: "Und, wisst Ihr ..." {n}Idira blickt verlegen weg.{/n} "Wenn mir nicht mehr viel Zeit bleibt, dann will ich sie wenigstens mit der Person bringen, die mir wirklich wichtig ist ... Ich hätte sie fast auf dumme Weise verloren, doch nun bin ich etwas klüger. Also ... werde ich jede Minute schätzen, die ich mit ihr verbringe."
languages.original_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

traits.locale_text: "Und, wisst Ihr ..." {n}Idira blickt verlegen weg.{/n} "Wenn mir nicht mehr viel Zeit bleibt, dann will ich sie wenigstens mit der Person bringen, die mir wirklich wichtig ist ... Ich hätte sie fast auf dumme Weise verloren, doch nun bin ich etwas klüger. Also ... werde ich jede Minute schätzen, die ich mit ihr verbringe."

languages.text: « Et puis, vous savez... S'il ne me reste pas beaucoup de temps, {n}dit-elle en détournant le regard d'un air gêné,{/n} au moins, je le partagerai avec la personne la plus chère à mon cœur... J'ai bien failli la perdre bêtement, mais j'ai grandi, depuis. Donc... je vais chérir chaque minute passée à ses côtés. »
languages.original_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."

traits.locale_text: « Et puis, vous savez... S'il ne me reste pas beaucoup de temps, {n}dit-elle en détournant le regard d'un air gêné,{/n} au moins, je le partagerai avec la personne la plus chère à mon cœur... J'ai bien failli la perdre bêtement, mais j'ai grandi, depuis. Donc... je vais chérir chaque minute passée à ses côtés. »

languages.text: "Ve ayrıca..." {n}İdira, utanarak gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Çok zamanım kalmamış olsa bile en azından bu zamanı gerçekten önemsediğim biriyle geçireceğim. Onu neredeyse aptalca sebeplerle kaybedecektim ama artık biraz olsun akıllandım. Bu yüzden de... Onunla geçireceğim her bir dakikanın değerini bileceğim."
languages.original_text: "And, you see..." {n}Idira looks away in embarrassment.{/n} "If I don't have much time left, I'll at least spend it with the person I really care about... I almost lost her stupidly, but I've wised up a bit now. So... I'm going to treasure every minute I spend with her."
